dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
CJ Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Johannes Stallkamp
Marc Schlipsing
Jan Salmen
Christian Igel
dcterms:description: The GTSRB dataset is a benchmark dataset for traffic sign recognition, containing images of various traffic signs collected from different locations and conditions. It includes 43 classes of traffic signs.
dcterms:title: GTSRB

dcterms:creator: Kyle D Julian
Ritchie Lee
Mykel J Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: TaxiNet is a dataset used for training neural network controllers for autonomous vehicles, specifically focusing on image-based control for taxiing aircraft. It includes images and corresponding cross-track distance labels.
dcterms:title: TaxiNet
